summary: The customer was having issues with their new phone and contacted Contoso Wireless for help. The customer service agent apologized for the inconvenience and asked what kind of issues the customer was having. After the customer explained the issues, the customer service agent offered to provide a replacement phone free of charge and arranged for someone to pick up the faulty phone from the customer's address. The replacement phone will arrive within 3-5 days and a customer service team will contact the customer shortly to arrange for pick up.
